catalysts.thesis: FDA approval of Yartemlea (narsoplimab) for TA-TMA marks a transformative commercial milestone, validated by an 81% stock surge.
catalysts.catalyst_details: FDA approved Yartemlea on Dec 29, 2025 (reported), the first treatment for hematopoietic stem cell transplant-associated thrombotic microangiopathy. Launch set for Jan 2026.
catalysts.prediction_market: Stock surged 81% post-approval; Market effectively priced near-0% chance of rejection given the move.
catalysts.recency_proof: Zacks Investment Research (Dec 29, 2025) - 'Omeros Gets FDA Approval for YARTEMLEA...'
catalysts.risk: Commercial execution and reimbursement uptake hurdles in early 2026.

catalysts.thesis: Significant earnings miss on Dec 31 signals deteriorating core business fundamentals despite haptic tech potential.
catalysts.catalyst_details: Q4 Earnings released Dec 31, 2025. EPS reported $0.08 vs $0.14 estimate (-41.43% surprise).
catalysts.prediction_market: Analyst Consensus: Strong Buy (Target $12.50) failed to predict the -41% EPS miss.
catalysts.risk: Potential patent litigation wins or unexpected licensing deals could reverse sentiment.

catalysts.thesis: FDA approval of oral Wegovy cements dominance in obesity market, providing a critical moat against Eli Lilly's entry.
catalysts.catalyst_details: FDA approved oral Wegovy (semaglutide 25mg) for weight loss. News circulated/updated Dec 30, 2025.
catalysts.prediction_market: Polymarket 'Obesity Drug Dominance' (Proxy); Stock rallied ~2.5% on news, confirming market approval pricing.
catalysts.recency_proof: Healthcare Finance News (Dec 30, 2025) - 'FDA approves Wegovy pill...'
catalysts.risk: Competition from Eli Lilly's orforglipron (oral GLP-1) expected in 2026.

catalysts.thesis: Earnings surprise and reduced burn rate indicate operational efficiency ahead of pivotal Multikine registration trial.
catalysts.catalyst_details: Earnings reported Dec 29, 2025. Stock rose 4.8%, defying options market implied volatility of ±19.9%.
catalysts.prediction_market: Options Market: Implied Move ±19.9% vs Actual +4.8% (Volatility Crush).
catalysts.risk: Historical tendency for stock to fade post-earnings; Multikine trial risks remain binary.
